S02ratnakeu:2269: prapūjanāya nāyakeṣu saṃsṛjed ya eva tad /
S02ratnakeu:2270: idaṃ tu yaḥ pradhānasūtram uttamaṃ hi dhārayet
S02ratnakeu:2271: sa puṇyam aprameyam evam āpnuyād viśāradaḥ // RKP_13.1
S02ratnakeu:2272: atha khalu ratnacchatraśrīs tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2273: datvā svarṇaniṣkāṃ gaṃgānadīsikatopamāṃ munivṛṣabhebhyaḥ prāpnoti puṇyam evaṃ yathā samuddiśya sūtram idam //
S02ratnakeu:2274: atha khalu girikūṭas tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2276: buddhebhyaḥ saṃpradadyāt pramuditasumanāḥ pūjanārthaṃ hi kaścit /
S02ratnakeu:2277: yaḥ paścāt kṣīṇakāle pratibhayarabhase dhārayet sūtram etat
S02ratnakeu:2278: puṇyasyāsya pramāṇaṃ na khalu kathayituṃ sarvasattvo 'pi śaktaḥ // RKP_13.2
S02ratnakeu:2279: atha khalu bhagavān api śākyamunis tathāgata evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2280: vartiṃ merupramāṇāṃ purata iha mune gandhatailāvasiktāṃ
S02ratnakeu:2282: yaḥ kaścit puṇyakāmo nivaraṇatanutāṃ prārthayan yas tv ihānyaḥ
S02ratnakeu:2283: sūtraṃ prakṣīṇakāleṣu sadasi kathayet puṇyam asmād viśiṣṭam // RKP_13.3
S02ratnakeu:2284: atha khalv akṣobhyas tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2285: kṣāntiṃ yaś ca vibhāvayet matidharo vīryaṃ sadā cārabhen
S02ratnakeu:2286: nityaṃ dhyānaparaḥ samāhitatanuḥ prajñāṃ ca visphārayet /
S02ratnakeu:2288: kṣīṇe yas tv iha dhārayet kaliyuge saddharmamudrām imām
S02ratnakeu:2289: eṣā kṣāntir idaṃ ca vīryam asamaṃ prajñā ca tasyātulā // RKP_13.4
S02ratnakeu:2290: atha khalu virajabalavikrāmī tathāgato 'py evam āha /
S02ratnakeu:2292: grāhayitvā parān yuktyā vācayitvā punaḥ sadā // RKP_13.5
S02ratnakeu:2294: yat puṇyaṃ samavāpnoti na tac chakyaṃ prakīrtitum // RKP_13.6
S02ratnakeu:2296: atha khalu te 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhā bhagavanto 'sya sūtrasyāprameyāṃ varṇaguṇānuśaṃsān udīrayitvā śakrabrahmalokapālān āhūyaivam ūcuḥ //
S02ratnakeu:2297: udgṛhṇīdhvaṃ mārṣā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakleśakṣayaṃkaraṃ yasya paścātkāle śravaṇamātreṇāpi sattvānāṃ sarvakarmāvaraṇakleśakṣayo bhaviṣyati //
S02ratnakeu:2299: āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandat // //
S02ratnakeu:2303: saṃskṛtvā ratnaketuṃ pracurabhayaharān dhāraṇīṃ yan mayāgryaṃ
S02ratnakeu:2305: sarvo 'yaṃ tena loko munivacanakathālaṃkṛtāṃ ratnaketuṃ hy
S02ratnakeu:2306: etām eva sphuṭārthām atiguṇaviśadāṃ prāpnuyāt sadya eva : // //
